ID: C1RMREM_02
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Shamil Binsuhfi <Shamil.Binsuhfi@chalhoub.com>; Rasheed ALNAJAR <Rasheed.ALNAJAR@chalhoub.com>

BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-23 14:27
Subject: Re: Insurance invoice
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Shamil,

Sorry for the delay in reply.

This is the adjustment premium for the period spanning 24/09/2023 to 23/09/2024.

To provide context, this is for the marine insurance policy of Allied Enterprises LLC. The insurer is provided an estimate of the expected imports/exports prior to inception of the policy for the 12 month period. After the policy ends, we provide the values of the actual imports/exports that materialized throughout the period and an adjustment premium for the differential.

Let me know if you need any further details.

Best Regards,
Hagop

I will respond to you upon my return. If urgent please contact my team below:

 

Saj & Fitra- jeswin.jacob@chalhoub.com
